entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:54 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -40.3°C

Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 09:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

Visibility: 16.1 km

entry.title: Saturday: Clear. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 56 this morning and minus 49 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 60 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
